nodes.text: The Rooted Moon was one of two inhabited moons of the planet Hetzal Prime, located in the Hetzal system of the Outer Rim Territories. Along with the Fruited Moon, the Rooted Moon focused on agricultural production. A spaceport was situated on the Rooted Moon, where the Twi'lek Sella worked as a bartender. During the High Republic Era, the Hetzal system and its population came under threat from anomalies that exited hyperspace.
